author: mbandrews
body:
- Remove TProfile2D formatting altogether--empty bins now correctly rendered vs. bins filled with 0 in ROOT 6.

In conjunction with 80X PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/16421. Overwrites temporary fix in 81X PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/16422.
title: Remove empty TProfile2D bin formatting.
